comments.text: Because there are already too many patches on implementing supported action, I will move supporting PiP to another bug. In addition, will also file a bug for supporting controlling media before media starts, which is a request from Firefox Reality team.
comments.author: alwu@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Because there are already too many patches on implementing supported action, I will move supporting PiP to another bug. In addition, will also file a bug for supporting controlling media before media starts, which is a request from Firefox Reality team.
comments.creator: alwu@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
This patch will
- remove `MediaControlKeysEvent` and use `MediaControlKey` to replace it
- rename names for all `MediaControlKey` related methods, functions, classes and descriptions

The advantage of doing so are
- remove the duplicated type so that we only need to maintain `MediaControlKey`
comments.text:
Created attachment 9153955
Bug 1640998 - part9 : use `MediaControlKey` to replace `MediaControlKeysEvent`

This patch will
- remove `MediaControlKeysEvent` and use `MediaControlKey` to replace it
- rename names for all `MediaControlKey` related methods, functions, classes and descriptions

The advantage of doing so are
- remove the duplicated type so that we only need to maintain `MediaControlKey`
comments.author: alwu@mozilla.com
comments.creator: alwu@mozilla.com
